text: Atah (he muham'mada sallallaho alaihe vasallama!) Dhairyadharana gara, juna kisimale sankalpavana rasulaharule dhairya gare. Ra uniharuko lagi yatanako nimti hatara nagara. Junadina yiniharule tyasa kurala'i dekhnechan, jasako uniharusita vaca garincha, (taba mahasusa garnechan) ki manaum sansarama dinako ekachinako lagi matra baseka thi'e. Yo kura'ana sandesa ho, tasartha (aba) tiniharu nai nasta hunechan jo avajnakari thi'e
